name: create folder
description: This action creates a new folder in the operating system at a given path.

path.description: Full directory path where the folder will be created

status.description: Indicates the result of the folder creation

path.description: The full path to the newly created folder

code:
import json
from pathlib import Path

base_path = str(input_data.get('path', '')).strip()
folder_name = str(input_data.get('folder_name', '')).strip()

if not base_path or not folder_name:
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'error', 'path': '', 'message': 'Both path and folder_name are required.'})
    exit()

try:
    target = (Path(base_path).expanduser() / folder_name)
    target.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'success', 'path': str(target.resolve())})
except Exception as e:
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'error', 'path': '', 'message': str(e)})
